title: Efficient Model Training Enhancements
summary: Implements new algorithms to reduce training time and improve model convergence rates.

title: Secure Model Training with Differential Privacy
summary: Adds support for differential privacy in model training to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with privacy standards.

title: Inaccurate Model Prediction for Time-Series Data
summary: The model provides incorrect predictions for time-series datasets, leading to potential misinterpretations and unnecessary adjustments.

title: False Positive Anomalies in Model Predictions
summary: The anomaly detection module incorrectly flags normal data patterns as anomalies, leading to unnecessary alerts.

title: Incorrect Dependency Graph in Model Training
summary: Users report that TensorFlow generates incorrect dependency graphs during model training, leading to inefficient resource allocation.

title: Incorrect Model Bottleneck Identification
summary: The model analysis tool incorrectly flags certain layers as bottlenecks, leading to misguided optimization efforts.
